title: Melanie Griffith, 62, stuns her Instagram followers by showing off a very toned figure
text:
Melanie Griffith shocked her fans on Tuesday by posing in nothing but her lingerie for her nearly 500K Instagram followers.

The 62-year-old siren was in a black bra and undies with open-toe heels as she posed for a mirror selfie in her walk-in closet.

The Working Girl star was modeling the new Kit Undergarments lingerie line from Simone Harouche and Jamie Mizrahi, two stylists who work with the Kardashian and Jenner families.

Leggy lady: Melanie Griffith shocked her fans on Tuesday by posing in nothing but her lingerie for her nearly 500K Instagram followers

You still got it! Melanie - whose parents are Tippi Hedren of The Birds and Peter Griffith - looked to be in perfect shape with a tiny waistline, toned legs and sculpted arms

Melanie - whose parents are Tippi Hedren of The Birds and Peter Griffith - looked to be in perfect shape with a tiny waistline, toned legs and sculpted arms.

The star looked as good as she did in the 1988 film Working Girl where she vacuumed her boss' home in her black lingerie.

The ex of Don Johnson and Antonio Banderas says she likes to work out several times a week, doing Pilates and jogging. And she also keeps a low carb diet.

Racy in the 1980s: In director Lawrence Kasdan's 1981 thriller Body Heat

She put her body on display: She wore lingerie in the 1988 film Working Girl

Goals for girls: With Daryl Hannah in the 1995 film Two Much from director Fernando Trueba

Her blonde hair was worn down with soft waves. The icon's closet was also impressive with rows and tows of shoes and plenty of drawers.

Behind her was a sitting room with a chair and vanity.

'So these 2 awesome, creative, incredibly chic stylists..@sweetbabyjamie and @simoneharouche have started this amazing new lingerie line @thekitundergarments,' said Griffith in the caption.

We are envious: Here the star looked slender while on a yacht with pals this summer

She sure does put the work in: Griffith hits the gym every day often working with Gunnar Peterson who also trains Khloe Kardashian and Kris Jenner

'I love everything they have made and btw want one of each! They also donate a portion of anything you buy to charity. FOLLOW THEM!!'

Melanie is close friends with Kris Jenner, who also knows the designers.

Fans said, 'Wow you look great' and 'Sexilicious!!' on Griffith's page.

Melanie still works all the time and was last on the TV series Hawaii 5-0 from 2014 until 2016. The cover girl also appeared on the Showtime series SMILF.

Earlier this month she wished her daughter Dakota Johnson - whose dad is Don Johnson - a happy birthday. 'My Coqui,' her post read. 'Happy birthday my beautiful girl! I am honored to be your mama.'

Melanie continued: 'So so proud of you! I love you with all of my heart.'

The actresses also shares a son, Alexander, with her second husband Steven Bauer, and daughter Stella Banderas with her ex Antonio Banderas.

Birthday girl: She marked her daughter's milestone birthday with a celebratory Instagram post earlier this month
